column2: By defeating the Warlords of Chin on the battlefield, we can begin bringing their people into the fold of Kyoshi.

§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! holds the line, slightly strengthening [From.GetHerHis] people's faith in §GWay of Chin§!!
